text:
MegaFon launched a convenient application for managing a virtual PBX
07 Nov 2019, 13:47 by Nikita Goryainov
Almost every self-respecting business uses virtual telephone exchanges today. But the convenience of managing these services from the point of view of a simple user lags far behind modern standards.
Open any application of the bank or operator, and then launch the console of your virtual PBX. As if rolled back 10 years, right?
MegaFon decided to fight this - launched a simple and intuitive application for managing its virtual PBX. It is called "Megaphone VATS". Already available on the App Store and Play Market.
In the new program, you can manage all the functions of the PBX from MegaFon, including listening to recordings of conversations, tracking the statistics of calls and so on. All this is done in a nice interface without unnecessary difficulties.
The result was such a pocket-sized control panel for your communication with customers and monitoring the work of call center employees. You can learn more about the Virtual PBX service on the MegaFon website.








Download QR-Code MegaFon VATSDeveloper: PJSC MegaFonPrice: Free
